QuestData.Title: Farmer Fung's Vote II: On the Loose
QuestData.Description: You want my vote for Farmer Yoon? Ha! You're joking, right?$B$BListen, I'm not going to vote for some citypaw with no lick a' knowledge about farming the earth.$B$BIt would be an embarrassment to farm alongside you or that Yoon shmuck.$B$BNow let me deal with my own problems. Some devil let my prize yaks loose, and now they're running wild northwest of Halfhill.$B$BIf I could just get my yaks back, then maybe I'd be able to sleep at night.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return 5 Escaped Shagskins to Farmer Fung's yak pen at the very north end of the Verdant Belt.
